entries.name: det()
entries.desc: Returns the determinant of A, calculated efficiently from the factorization.

entries.name: singular?()
entries.desc: Returns true if U, and hence A, is singular.

entries.name: solve(b)
entries.desc: Returns m so that A*m = b, or equivalently so that L*U*m = P*b b can be a Matrix or a Vector

entries.name: to_ary()
entries.desc: Returns L, U, P in an array

entries.name: u()
entries.desc: Returns the upper triangular factor U
